Your job within the Orchard’s theocratic hierarchy is to relive and interpret the ALLMOTHER's memories of life before the fall, a thousand years ago.

 
Read more
articles.title: 1000xResist is a time travel story inspired by Star Trek, the pandemic and immigrant trauma

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Blackbird Interactive, the team behind upcoming strategy game Homeworld 3, have released details on both the planned roadmap and the game’s chunky-looking collector’s edition, ahead of the game’s release next month, 13th May.
The roadmap details three pieces of paid DLC for the year ahead, plus an additional planned paid piece in 2025. This is alongside several free content updates. Together, they’re all targeted at fleshing out the game’s ‘War Games’ three player co-op mode. Specifically, the roadmap details new playable factions, starting fleets, challenges, emblems, and maps.
 
Read more
articles.title: Homeworld 3 DLC plans revealed alongside collector’s edition with model spaceships

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Nowadays, I'm more than happy to sacrifice high frames and a big screen for the comforts of the Steam Deck. I like lounging on the couch, the light forearm workout, and heating my room in only a few minutes. So it's good news that Moon Studios' upcoming ARPG No Rest For The Wicked will be playable on launch for Deck, the ROG Ally and other handhelds. Minimum PC specs also don't look too taxing, but those after the shiniest-looking game on recommended hardware may be in for a shock.
Read more
articles.title: No Rest For The Wicked will be playable on Steam Deck, although recommended PC specs may be a worry

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Slavic Magic, the sole creator behind anticipated (sub genres forthcoming) strategy game Manor Lords, has written a transparent and refreshingly to-the-point blog post on Steam addressing both expectations and future updates. Specifically, Slavic Magic aka Greg Manor Lords has taken time to outline exactly what his game - currently the most wishlisted on Steam, ahead of Hades 2 - isn’t.
 
Read more
articles.title: Manor Lords dev staves off early access disappointment by explaining his game isn't here to murder Total War

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Bethesda's very own Mr Handy (director and executive producer) Todd Howard has addressed the controversy surrounding the Fallout TV show's treatment of Fallout backstory, reaffirming the canonicity of Obsidian's Fallout: New Vegas and promising that Bethesda and Amazon are being "careful" to maintain consistency between the games and the TV series. Are you new to this latest lore scandal? Watch out for Fallout Season 1 spoilers ahead, then.

 
Read more
articles.title: Bethesda's Todd Howard clarifies the fate of Shady Sands in the Fallout TV show timeline

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
“It’s time to venture outside your fortress!” reads Kitfox’s invitation to play the beta for Adventure Mode in Dwarf Fortress on Steam. Sounds like a trap to me. Sounds like the kind of thing a werebadger would say, to lure you out of hiding. Are there werebadgers in Dwarf Fortress? If there aren’t, I have to ask what developers Bay 12 have been doing all these years. Doubtless, the hills and valleys of the hitherto base-construction-only Steam edition are teeming with were-creatures of every flavour. Werefinches! Wereotters! Werebudgerigars! Werepoets!

 
Read more
articles.title: Militia to the gates, please - the Dwarf Fortress Steam edition's Adventure Mode beta is live

articles.author: Alice O'Connor
articles.description:
Last time, you decided that gliding powers are better than Dragon's Dogma 2's Unmaking Arrow. Honestly I'm surprised it was that close (66% vs 33%—don't sweat the rounding), and I'm proud of your ability to weigh a whole concept against a single-game implementation. We are so good at this. Onwards! This week, I ask you to choose between placing things in two very different ways. What's better: a 'put back' action, or standing atop another player's head in an FPS?
Read more
articles.title: What's better: a 'put back' action, or standing atop another player's head in an FPS?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Guzdek)
articles.description: Mnoho let na svém počítači provozují Gentoo, což znamená hodiny a dny strávené kompilací. Posbíral jsem data a zjistil, kolik mě za 13 let stál provoz na nákladech na elektřinu v kompilovaném systému.
articles.title: Kolik stojí provoz Gentoo? Zruinují vás náklady na elektřinu?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Knihovna Faust zajišťuje proudové zpracování dat a je postavena nad Apache Kafkou. Nejedná se však o pouhou realizaci producentů a konzumentů, protože je možné používat lokální tabulky, asynchronní zpracování atd.
articles.title: Faust: platforma pro proudové zpracování dat v Pythonu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Živoslav Bolf)
articles.description: Každý by si měl pořídit svůj vlastní server. Pojďme si povídat o tom, proč a jak si vytvořit svůj vlastní virtuální ostrov svobody a proč k tomu použít právě linuxovou distribuci NixOS.
articles.title: Která distribuce je nejlepší na server a proč právě NixOS?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Dnes si představíme nástroj pro tvorbu webových stránek, zjistíme si vlastnosti rezistorů podle barevného kódu, přehrajeme si videa z YouTube v prostředí KDE Plasma a vyzkoušíme si správce pro Elgato Stream Deck.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (24. 4. 2024): webové stránky moderně, multiplatformně a vektorově

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Na předchozí dva články o manipulaci s veličinami a jednotkami dnes navážeme. Ukážeme si, jak je tato problematika řešena v rozsáhlé knihovně Astropy. Jde o sadu balíčků využitelných zejména v astronomii.
articles.title: Manipulace s veličinami a jednotkami v knihovně Astropy

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CESNET CERTS)
articles.description: V dnešním díle postřehů se podíváme na zranitelnost SSH klienta Putty, na varování Cisca před zranitelností v IMC, na zatýkání kyberzločinců a další zajímavosti z bezpečnosti ve světě výpočetní techniky.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: hromadné zatýkání kyberzločinců

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Bylo vydáno desktopové prostředí LXQt 2.0. Mozilla konečně začíná nabízet linuxové binární soubory Firefoxu ARM64. Společnost Volla spustila na Kickstarteru crowdfundingovou kampaň na Volla Tablet.
articles.title: LXQt 2.0 s podporou Qt6, linuxový Firefox pro ARM64

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Mozilla nabízí binárky Firefoxu pro ARM64 Linux, Wine 9.7 vylepšuje podporu ARMu, týden v KDE a další práce na šestkové Plasmě, otevřený Vulkan ovladač pro stařičké Radeony HD 6000 pro Windows.
articles.title: Herní engine Godot i MPV 0.38 vylepšují podporu API Vulkan

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Mým cílem je vytvořit nástroj na sémantickou segmentaci obrázků, ale s co možná nejmenším programátorským úsilím. Doposud jsem si vždy nějakou část modelu skládal vlastníma rukama, ale ono to může jít i jednodušeji.
articles.title: Segmentace MRI mozku – knihovna TASM

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Někdy okolnosti dokopou člověka do situace, kdy si chce či musí dát od něčeho pauzu. Jaké to je být měsíc bez Linuxu, ač u něj člověk beztak sedí každý den a proč jsou si OS dnes tak podobné?
articles.title: Sbližování Linuxu s Windows běží dál

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vyšlo očekávané Ubuntu 24.04 LTS Noble Numbat, které bude mít standardní podporu do června roku 2029. Stávajícím uživatelům předchozí LTS verze bude aktualizace nabídnuta až s prvním opravným vydáním 24.04.1 LTS, které je plánováno na 15. srpna. Uživatelé verze 23.10 s krátkou podporou budou vyzváni k aktualizaci okamžitě.
articles.title: Vyšlo Ubuntu 24.04 LTS Noble Numbat s GNOME 46

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Grafické uživatelské rozhraní projektu OpenRazer zajišťující na Linuxu ovládací GUI všem užiatelům zařízení a periferií značky Razer, pomalu přechází na Qt5. Vedle Polychromatic 0.8.4 nyní vyšla i verze 0.9, která nově využívá pro svůj běh knihovnu PyQt6 a tudíž Qt6.
articles.title: Polychromatic, GUI projektu OpenRazer, přechází na Qt6

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Sotva vyšla Fedora 40, už se sbíhají zajímavé nápady pro verzi příští. Jedním z nich je návrh na tzv. Fedora Miracle Spin, tedy verzi Fedory využívající dlaždicový Wayland kompozitor Miracle, který vychází z projektu Mir, původně plánovaného konkurenta Waylandu od Canonicalu, nyní též Wayland kompozitoru.
articles.title: Fedora 41 možná i ve verzi s Wayland kompozitorem na bázi Miru

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Rozhodnutí vlády o ukončení podpory IPv4, zkušenosti s IPv6 v cloudovém řešení nebo provozování IPv6-only prostředí, nejen tato témata jsou na programu devátého ročníku tradiční konference o IPv6, které se uskuteční 6. června v Národní technické knihovně. Kompletní program včetně registračního formuláře a dalších informací jsou k dispozici na adrese denipv6.cz.
articles.title: Program konference Den IPv6 2024 je kompletní, registrujte se včas

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Včera jsme psali o tom, že se zřejmě schyluje k oznámení prodeje firmy HashiCorp, kterou by měla koupit společnost IBM. Obě společnosti už akvizici potvrdily, cena byla nakonec stanovena na 6,4 miliardy dolarů. Schopnosti společnosti HashiCorp pro dosažení významných synergií v několika strategických oblastech růstu IBM, včetně Red Hatu, zabezpečení dat, automatizace IT a poradenství, uvádí v oznámení IBM.
articles.title: IBM kupuje společnost HashiCorp za 6,4 miliardy dolarů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři virtualizačního nástroje Proxmox oznámili verzi 8.2. Tato verze je založena na Debianu 12.5 „Bookworm“, ale aktualizuje celou řadu balíčků v něm. Používá proto novější linuxové jádro 6.8, QEMU 8.1, LXC 6.0, Ceph 18.2 a ZFS 2.2.
articles.title: Proxmox 8.2 nabízí automatický import virtuálů z VMware ESXi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Pojďte s námi prozkoumat tajuplný svět hackingu a množství jeho jednotlivých zákoutí. Průvodcem na této cestě vám bude zkušený etický hacker s mnohaletou praxí, který se s vámi podělí o své zkušenosti. Připravili jsme pro vás šestidenní online kurz Hacking v praxi, který je z velké části placený úřadem práce.
articles.title: Šestidenní online kurz Hacking v praxi dotovaný úřadem práce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Raspberry Pi Foundation od roku 2014 poskytuje výkon počítače Raspberry Pi ve flexibilním provedení navrženém speciálně pro průmyslové a vestavěné aplikace. Tato varianta se nazývá Raspberry Pi Compute Module. Dnes bylo oznámeno rozšíření nabídky Compute Module 4S, který je kromě původní 1GB varianty také dostupný s 2 GB, 4 GB a 8 GB paměti.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4S má až 8 GB paměti

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Podle deníku Wall Street Journal je na spadnutí dohoda o převzetí společnosti HashiCorp společností IBM. Smlouva by měla být uzavřena v nejbližších dnech. Cena společnosti byla stanovena na 4,9 miliardy dolarů. Akcie společnosti HashiCorp po této zprávě vyskočily téměř o 20 %.
articles.title: Firma HashiCorp byla údajně koupena společností IBM

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Evropský parlament v úterý přijal směrnici týkající se takzvaného práva spotřebitele na opravu. Poslanci ji podpořili 584 hlasy, tři byli proti a čtrnáct se zdrželo hlasování. Směrnice ujasňuje povinnosti výrobců opravovat zboží a motivovat spotřebitele k tomu, aby si výrobky nechávali opravit a prodloužili tak jejich životnost.
articles.title: Evropský parlament schválil směrnici zajišťující právo spotřebitele na opravu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vyšla nová verze virtualizačního nástroje QEMU s označením 9.0. Blokový ovladač virtio-blk získal podporu více front, takže různé fronty na jednom disku mohou být zpracovávány různými vlákny I/O. Výsledkem by měla být lepší škálovatelnost.
articles.title: QEMU 9.0 s podporou front pro blokový ovladač VirtIO

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Rok po předchozím vydání vychází Nginx verze 1.26.0, která obsahuje nové funkce a opravy chyb z vývojové větve 1.25.x.
articles.title: Nginx 1.26 přidává experimentální podporu pro HTTP/3

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nový ovladač pro GPU Intel ve verzi 31.0.101.5444 přináší na platformě Windows zrychlení běhu řady her o jednotky až desítky procent. Pro velké grafické karty rodiny Arc jde o zrychlení až o 36 % v Need for Speed: Heat, pro iGPU se nejvíc nový ovladač posouvá o 48 % u hry Mass Effect Legendary Edition.
articles.title: Intel zrychluje běh svých integrovaných GPU i karet Arc až o desítky procent

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Tvůrci zvukové střižny Audacity měli tu drzost vydat novou verzi 3.5. Mezi novinkami je možnost volitelně ukládat projekty na cloudové úložiště Audio.com, což umožní synchronizaci projektů skrze více zařízení při spolupráci více tvůrců. Nová verze také přidává automatickou detekci tempa pro importované smyčky, nedestruktivní úpravy výšky tónu (pitch), formáty titulků pro popisky, přepracovaný systém plug-inů, vylepšenou podporu BSD a řadu dalších dílčích úprav.
articles.title: Audacity 3.5 přináší ukládání do cloudu a lepší podporu BSD

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Linuxová distribuce Fedora, neboli Fedora Workstation Edition, vychází v nové verzi 40, která staví na GNOME 46, případně v KDE variantě na nové Plasmě 6.0. Také se navrací se značkou “Fedora Atomic Desktop” pro varianty využívající ostree či neměnné obrazy, nově už tyto varianty nebudou označovány jako immutable, v rámci změn v názvosloví, které Fedora nyní řeší. Systém nově nabídne první PyTorch balíček, ale zatím bez GPU/NPU akcelerace, běžící jen na CPU. Pro AMD je k dispozici výpočetní framework ROCm (v budoucnu dostane podporu PyTorch).
articles.title: Vydána Fedora 40, s GNOME 46 či Plasmou 6

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Charles Fol objevil ve standardní knihovně GNU C (glibc) chybu starou 24 let. Problém se konkrétně nachází ve funkci iconv() v knihovně GNU C verze 2.39 a starší. Při převodu řetězců na znakovou sadu ISO-2022-CN-EXT může přetéct výstupní vyrovnávací paměť až o čtyři bajty, což může vést k pádu aplikace nebo k přepsání sousední proměnné.
articles.title: Chyba v knihovně GNU C Library (glibc) ohrožuje servery s PHP

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Nadace Open Home Foundation oznámila svou existenci a snahu stát se podpůrnou organizací pro pro bezplatné projekty domácí automatizace. Založili jsme nadaci Open Home Foundation, abychom bojovali za základní principy soukromí, volby a udržitelnosti chytrých domů za každého člověka, který v nich žije, píše se v oznámení.
articles.title: Open Home Foundation nabízí soukromí v chytré domácnosti

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tomáš Vondra)
articles.description: Byl zveřejněn program letošního ročníku konference Prague PostgreSQL Developer Day, která se koná 4. a 5. června. Zaregistrovat se můžete na webu registrace.p2d2.cz.
articles.title: Prague PostgreSQL Developer Day 2024 má program a registraci

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: SD karty mají na sobě hned několik označení týkající se rychlosti, až je v tom docela pěkný zmatek. Nás nyní bude zajímat Application Performance Class, které jsou buď A1 a A2 a označují karty s větším IOPS, tedy vhodné například do telefonu pro rychlé startování aplikací. Karty A2 navíc podporují řazení příkazů do fronty (Command Queueing), což musí umět jak řadič, tak i ovladač.
articles.title: Rychlejší A2 SD karty v Raspberry Pi 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: O zranitelnosti procesorů Intel nativní BHI (Branch History Injection) jsme před nedávnem psali. Server Phoronix testoval vliv záplaty na výkon u Raptor Lake s hardwarovou podporou BHI_DIS_S a naměřil při kompilaci zmenšení výkonu jen do 2 %. Testy Kraken a Octane prohlížeče Firefox byly nižší asi o 7,5 %.
articles.title: BHI záplata snižuje u starších procesorů výkon v databázích až o 12 %

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Mozilla v pátek na blogu oznámila dostupnost Firefoxu Nightly (vývojová verze kompilovaná denně) pro Linux na ARM64 (AArch64). Je to dáno rozmachem Linuxu na procesorech ARM, který odstartovalo patrně Raspberry Pi.

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Štrobl)
articles.description: Moderní vývoj aplikací si vyžaduje nové přístupy. V případě cloudu se tomu říká cloud native development a přesně to je téma dalšího Cloud Native Prague meetupu. Ten je již dvanáctý v pořadí a pořádat se tentokráte bude v kancelářích CodeNOW v Pražském Pankráci. Akce se koná již 24. dubna v 17:30, není tedy času nazbyt.

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Distribuce začínají pracovat na reprodukovatelných balíčcích protože to zjednodušuje bezpečnost. Každý si může balíček sám zkompilovat a prověřit jeho kontrolní součet s tím, který dodává distribuce. Nejdále je s reprodukovatelnými balíčky patrně Debian, který začal již v roce 2015. Například Trixie má přes 96 % reprodukovatelných balíčků.

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: bkralik)

articles.description: One of the leading-edge benefits of Fedora Linux is that it always ships with the most up-to-date open-source compiler toolchains at release. For their spring releases each year, it typically means shipping with a GCC compiler that isn't even officially released as stable yet. With this week's release of Fedora 40, it's shipping with GCC 14.0.1 as the development version that will culminate with the inaugural GCC 14 stable release in the coming weeks. Plus Fedora 40 has all of the other latest GNU toolchain components and then over on the LLVM side is with the current LLVM 18 stable series. For those curious how GCC 14 vs. LLVM Clang 18 performance is looking, here is a wide range of C/C++ benchmarks carried out on Fedora Workstation 40 using a System76 Thelio Major workstation powered by the Zen 4 AMD Ryzen Threadripper 7980X.

articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
The world after Fallout is one ripe full of dangerous things that want to kill you on sight. Being able to sneak around such things is valuable, so here are the best starting attributes to master the art of stealth.


Best SPECIAL stats for Stealth Build in Fallout 4


There are many viable builds for playing through Fallout 4, but Stealth is one of the strongest, especially early on. This is because Stealth only requires a few stats to get going where as other builds require more investment in the Peak Tree. Here are the stats you should prioritize.





Agility


Agility is the most important stat for any Stealth-focused build in Fallout 4, as it is the stat that governs how well you can employ stealth as a mechanic. Every point Agility improves your inherent stealth ability, but it is a…
articles.title: Fallout 4 Best starting stats for Stealth build

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
Eric ‘ConcernedApe’ Barone has been pumping out the updates for Stardew Valley again and this time, as part of 1.6.4, we’ve got another new fishing based feature that will help if you’re hoping to catch a large number of fish. 


Fish Frenzies are signposted events which can happen in the following areas:



The Mountains


The Forest


The Beach


Pelican Town River



You’ll know when a Fish Frenzy is occurring because a pop-up will appear in the lower left corner of the screen, much like when you level up a skill or a train is passing through the valley. 


What is a Fish Frenzy in Stardew Valley?


Screenshot by Destructoid


When you see the pop-up, head to the area described within it and find the bubbling spot in the water. The spot will be filled with many fish, jumping out of the water. This is, for all intents and purposes, a Fish Frenzy. 


Once you’ve found this spot, cast your line and you’ll be able to enjoy much shorter times between bites, allowing you to catch a large number of fish. Of course, the fish you catch will be limited to the type associated with the current Frenzy and you should make sure to take plenty of Bait and Bobbers.


How to maximise profit from a Fishing Frenzy


Image by Destructoid


Fish are, at base level, usually not worth much. However, if you’re looking to sell your caught fish for profit, you can massively increase their value by using a Smoker. 


When placed in a Smoker, fish retain their quality while their value is doubled. Depending on the fish, you can make a lot of Gold this way.

The post What is a Fish Frenzy in Stardew Valley? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: What is a Fish Frenzy in Stardew Valley?

articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
If you've been playing No Rest For the Wicked, there's a good chance you ran into a man named Finley locked in a cell within the Nameless Pass. Any attempt to open his cell is blocked by the need for a certain Quarry Guard Key, so if you haven't found it yet, here's where you can.


How to get the Quarry Guard Key in No Rest For The Wicked (Map)


Unlike most other keys in No Rest For The Wicked, the Quarry Guard Key is rather hidden and well out of the way. The key is located in a hanging cell above the prison where Finley is imprisoned. As the cell is hanging, there is no traditional method or pathway that will allow you to reach it. Instead, you'll need to do a bit of climbing and careful platforming to reach it.


First things first, if you haven't already, make your way over to the ci…
articles.title: Where to find the Quarry Guard Key in No Rest For The Wicked

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
Nintendo may have now aimed its infamous legal prowess on Facepunch Studios of Garry's Mod fame, from the looks of things. "They don't want you playing with [Nintendo IP content] in Garry's Mod," says the recent announcement from Facepunch, with the studio now removing all Nintendo-related stuff from its Workshop.


This information comes from Facepunch Studios' official statement on Steam, which plainly stated that the purge of any and all Nintendo content was deliberate: "This is not a mistake, the takedowns come from Nintendo," it says. 




A curious wrinkle


Early on, there was some uncertainty as to whether Nintendo really is or isn't behind the takedown requests. Nintendo has yet to publicly chime in on the issue, and some members of the GMOD community claimed that a "fraudster" is engineering the crisis instead.  In response to the community's concerns, Garry Newman of Facepunch Studios said that his team was "doing [its] own investigations" on the matter.


Setting these suspicions of foul play aside, however, Newman has since clarified that he's been "assured that the takedowns have been verified by Nintendo as legit, so [the content takedown] will continue as planned."




"If you want to help us by deleting your Nintendo-related uploads and never uploading them again, that would help us a lot," says the announcement on Steam. At the same time, some of the community members who have been keeping track of the situation as it developed have been trying their best to preserve the mods for as long as possible. A worthy objective or a breach of IP law? Time will tell.

The post Garry’s Mod is pulling down years of Nintendo content, but players suspect foul play appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Garry’s Mod is pulling down years of Nintendo content, but players suspect foul play

articles.author: Matt Porter
articles.description:
One of the most controversial and divisive things in Call of Duty right now is Operator skins. As Activision gets more creative and out there with their designs, long-time fans of the series claim they're ruining the game. Unfortunately for those against them, they aren't going anywhere. 


CoD's over-the-top skins have been a conversation topic for years but picked up again on April 24 when Activision revealed the Tracer Pack: Wubz and Friends and the Tracer Pack: Hare-raiser Operators that will arrive as part of MW3 and Warzone Season 3 Reloaded. 


Fans were immediately critical, with fans on Reddit asking how they could call the game a military shooter, with another saying Call of Duty is now a "circus with a bunch of clowns running around."


They're not exactly soldiers. Image via Ac…
articles.title: Call of Duty’s absurd and wacky skins aren’t going away any time soon

articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.description:
Fans of American football are no doubt looking forward to the next entry in EA's Madden NFL series, presumably titled Madden NFL 25. As such, we've compiled everything we know about this year's game, including when it'll launch and which platforms it will be available for.


At the time of writing, EA hasn't actually formally announced a new Madden NFL game for 2024. However, it's likewise not said anything about not releasing one this year. Plus, considering it's been an annual staple of the company's sports games since 1990, it's reasonable to assume a 2024 entry is in the works.


When will Madden 25 release?


Image via EA


Although no official release date has been shared yet, the series' track record suggests Madden NFL 25 will launch in August. Previous Madden games have typically …
articles.title: Madden 25 2024 release window, platforms, and more

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Have you ever wanted to make a few new friends while playing Project Baki 3? Whether you're looking for a quick conversation or need to ask for help, several resources can jumpstart your progress. Let's talk about Project Baki 3's Trello and Discord server.


How to join the Project Baki 3 Trello


Project Baki 3's Trello, which you can access by clicking the linked text, contains information about every character, item, and fighting style in the game. From important links like the official Project Baki Discord to in-depth information about quests and bosses, you'll find all the information you need about the game's features.





The Trello will also feature changes as the game updates, with new cards added over time and current ones actively edited by the board's admins. That way, if a n…
articles.title: Project Baki 3 Trello and Discord links to connect with the community

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
Having launched in October 2023, Lords of the Fallen quickly made a name for itself as a reasonably solid Soulslike that could've used a bit more time in the oven. Thankfully, developer Hexworks took the time to deliver improvements, with update 1.5 adding the Master of Fate modifier system.


As Lords of the Fallen prided itself on attempting to innovate the Soulslike niche with features such as its twin-world rendering, it should come as no surprise that its Master of Fate modifiers were the most exciting item on the post-launch content docket. Specifically, Master of Fate allows players to essentially redefine the rules of the experience through custom modifiers that include randomized item and enemy spawns, a full-fledged Ironman mode with perma-death, and loads more. The release of th…
articles.title: Lords of the Fallen: Master of Fate modifier system is now out

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Even though Diablo 4 typically releases new seasons on a quarterly schedule, Season 4 has undergone a slight delay due to massive changes and the first-ever Diablo 4 PTR for testing purposes. As such, the Diablo 4 Season 4 release date and exact release time are a bit further away than usual.





What day and time does Diablo 4 Season 4 start?


The new Diablo 4 Season 4 release date is May 14, 2024 with the exact start time of 10am PST. Everytime there is a new season, the previous season ends on the same day that the new season begins. Unlike similar ARPG's like Path of Exile, there is no downtime between the seasons. As you can see in the screenshot above, Diablo 4 Season 3, Season of the Construct, is scheduled to end on May 14. This means that is when the new season will start as wel…
articles.title: Diablo 4 Season 4 release date and exact release time

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
If you’ve been trying to join an open crew after the April 25, 2024 update for 2018's Sea of Thieves, you will have been met with frustration. As of right now, open crew matchmaking isn’t working, and the development team is aware of it.


The developers have stated that the open crew matchmaking will be fixed and working again with the April 30, 2024 patch. This means when Season 12 drops, Sea of Thieves’ open crews should be available again.




This also means that if you bought Sea of Thieves premium version on PS5 in order to get the five day Early Access, then Open Crew won’t be available until it fully launches on April 30. It’s a pretty big bummer for anyone who paid extra on PS5 and doesn’t have a pre-existing group to team up with.


However, PVP matchmaking and private crew should still be available. You will still be able to battle against other ships and can still play with friends, but the drop-in crew system is non-functional for the next few days.


To reiterate, Open Crew matchmaking is currently down. It should be fixed and re-enabled for the April 30, 2024 Season 12 update.

The post Sea of Thieves Open Crew matchmaking down, when will it return? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Sea of Thieves Open Crew matchmaking down, when will it return?

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
When things go wrong in Sea of Thieves, you'll always be given an error code, but every code is a beard. While this helps figure out the issue, it doesn't always mean there's an easy fix. 


Since Sea of Thieves is an online seafaring game that challenges you to explore its vast seas in search of treasure and ships to steal or destroy, it's had its fair share of server issues. These usually occur around major milestones for the game, such as the launch of a new platform or a period of early access. One of the most common errors you'll see around these times is the Charcoalbeard error, to which there's a potential fix you can quickly try.  


How to fix the Charcoalbeard error in Sea of Thieves


Image via Microsoft


To fix the Charcoalbeard error in Sea of Thieves, you need to quit the ga…
articles.title: How to fix Sea of Thieves Charcoalbeard error

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
As with all online games, Sea of Thieves relies on servers to host players so they can sail its open seas and plunder the depths freely. But that reliance becomes an issue when servers go down. 


Every time you log into Sea of Thieves and sail away on an adventure, you're joining a server with dozens of other crews who could help or hinder your efforts. There are many servers for you to join, filled with the game's 40 million and growing player base, which is fantastic if you're hoping for an occupied online world. The downside is that everyone suffers when the servers go down, and no one can figure out what's going on. 


Is Sea of Thieves down?


Screenshot via PlayStation's YouTube channel


Sea of Thieves is back online, as the latest update has been implemented with the release of th…
articles.title: Why is Sea of Thieves down? How to check the server status

articles.author: Madison Benson
articles.description:
Fortnite's Avatar Elements event is here, introducing several Avatar: The Last Airbender characters, weapons, and cosmetics. While many rewards come with the event's Battle Pass, Appa's Glider will take weeks of questing to find. Here's how to get the Appa Glider in Fortnite.


How to unlock the Appa Glider in Fortnite Avatar Elements event


Screenshot by Destructoid


During Fortnite's Avatar Elements event, you'll unlock the Appa Glider after opening six Chakras. You'll find the Chakra list by heading into your quests menu, where you'll find a list of quests related to each element. Completing one list of Chakra quests lets you open your first Chakra, unlocking the next set until you finish all six stages.


Since each Chakra quest list unlocks over time, you won't get the Appa Glider i…
articles.title: How to get the Appa Glider in Fortnite Avatar Elements event

articles.author: Matt Porter
articles.description:
If you fancy unlocking a new animated camo for your guns in Warzone and MW3, then you need to get involved with the Vortex Vi.Rus Mainframe event. Here's how you can unlock the Binary Mortality animated weapon skin. 


There are plenty of camos to unlock in both Warzone and MW3, but few of them are animated. That's why when one comes along, you need to make sure you get your hands on it before it disappears for good. 


If you want to add the Binary Mortality animated camo to your collection, I can explain how you can unlock it, and how long you've got to do it. 


How to unlock Binary Mortality weapon skin in MW3 and Warzone


To unlock the Binary Mortality camo in MW3 and Warzone, you'll need to earn an eyewatering 548,000 XP during the Vortex Vi.Rus Mainframe event. 


The best way to do this is by completing daily or weekly challenges while playing matches. 


When does the Vortex Vi.Rus Mainframe event end? 


The Vortex Vi.Rus Mainframe event ends on Wednesday, May 8, 2024. Once this event is finished, you will no longer be able to unlock the Binary Mortality skin, so you'll need to start grinding now if you want to add it to your inventory. 


All Vortex Vi.Rus Mainframe rewards: XP requirements


You'll need to get grinding. Screenshot via Destructoid



Loadout weapon sticker: 9,500 XP


Weapon Double XP token: 21,250 XP


Point and Click large decal: 36,550 XP


Battle Pass Double XP token: 55,600 XP


Pop-Up, Pop-Off emblem: 79,500 XP


Going Viral large decal: 109,700 XP


Got Hacked calling card: 147,700 XP


Battle Pass Tier Skip: 195,600 XP


Block Fly charm: 255,950 XP


Sneakin' In weapon sticker: 332,000 XP


Error Code calling card: 427,800 XP


Binary Mortality animated camo: 548,500 XP


The post How to unlock MW3 and Warzone’s Binary Mortality animated camo appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to unlock MW3 and Warzone’s Binary Mortality animated camo

articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.description:
Ahead of a report on its earnings for the 2024 fiscal year, Capcom has revised its earnings forecast thanks to strong sales across its catalog of games, in particular highlighting Dragon's Dogma 2.


In an April 25 press release, Capcom announced it had raised its net sales forecast for the 2024 fiscal year (which covers April 2023 through to March 2024) by 8.9%. It originally estimated it would make 140,000 million yen (tantamount to just under $900 million) in sales, but has now updated it to 152,400 million yen (about $979 million). As such, overall profits and shareholder earnings are all up too, which points to Capcom's 2024 fiscal year being more successful than it initially expected.


Image via Capcom


Capcom namedrops Dragon's Dogma 2 (which launched shortly before the end of the…
articles.title: Dragon’s Dogma 2 and other Capcom games have made more money than expected

articles.author: Matt Porter
articles.description:
Ark 2 was first announced at The Game Awards in 2020, but four years on, we still haven't been able to roam the world and find the dinosaurs that inhabit it. After a delay to the game's 2023 launch, we now have a release window for Ark 2, and we don't have too long to wait. 


Ark: Survival Evolved is one of the most popular survival games on the market, and almost a decade after its 2015 launch, plenty of players are still regularly jumping into the dinosaur-infested world. 


It shouldn't be any surprise then that fans of the genre are desperate to get their hands on the next installment in the series, so here's everything we know about Ark 2's release window. 


Ark 2 was delayed in March 2023. Image via Studio Wildcard


Ark 2 release window


Ark 2 is scheduled to launch in late 2024,…
articles.title: When does Ark 2 come out? Release window, platforms, more

articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.description:
Since its inception, fan-made puzzle game PokeDoku only offered daily puzzles, meaning once you cleared one, you had to wait till the next day to keep playing. Now, though, you can spend all day every day solving PokeDoku puzzles thanks to the long-awaited introduction of Unlimited Mode.


Creator Doku_Games confirmed the addition of Unlimited Mode earlier today on the PokeDoku Twitter account. If you've never heard of PokeDoku until now, it's exactly what it sounds like: Sudoku but with Pokémon instead of numbers. The goal is to fill out a 9x9 grid with Pokémon that fill two conditions. So, for example, a Baby Pokémon that is also an Electric type. You also can't use the same Pokémon twice, and you only have nine moves, meaning a single mistake will cost you your winning streak.


Screens…
articles.title: PokeDoku Unlimited Mode lets you play your daily obsession multiple times a day

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
The last few days have seen a slew of interesting sci-fi news that you're going to want to read about. We've got some information about a timeline clarification for the upcoming Alien TV show, a new M. Night Shyamalan, the renewal of the phenomenal Fallout TV show, and great news about Severance Season 2. 


Amazon renews Fallout for a second season


Image via Bethesda/Steam.


It's time to celebrate like the Vault door has opened for the first time in decades, because Amazon has renewed its critically acclaimed Fallout TV show for a second season. The show's official Twitter account confirms that the showrunners and fan reception impressed Amazon the most, with this series being among the top three to air on the service since Rings of Power. 


I know many of the Destructoid team have fo…
articles.title: Latest sci-fi news: Fallout Season 2, Sandra Yi Sencindiver joins Alien TV show, M. Night Shyamalan’s Trap, and Severance

articles.author: Gabran Gray
articles.description:
Fallout’s wasteland stretches across the United States from the Pacific Ocean to the Atlantic, and as you might imagine, there’s a nearly endless supply of groups vying for control over bits of territory. 


Some Fallout factions have lengthy histories that explain how they've stretched across the US while others a local groups that only appear in one or two games. The Fallout TV show is giving some factions an overhaul, and it also seems to be getting ready to re-introduce Vault-Tec as fully fledged faction in the post-war era. The future of Fallout is still up for grabs, but here's what the biggest factions to date have been up to. 


Screenshot via Prime Video YouTube


The Brotherhood of Steel


The Brotherhood is the most iconic faction in all of Fallout, and, yes, that’s mostly becau…
articles.title: All the major Fallout factions explained

articles.author: Cameron Woolsey
articles.description:
Surviving the harsh world of No Rest for the Wicked requires more than weapons. Enhancements come in all forms in the game, such as Runes. Here's how to find and equip all the Runes in No Rest for the Wicked, along with what they do.


Runes are magical artifacts in No Rest for the Wicked and become available to you once you meet with Eleanor in Sacrament. She can sell Runes, slot them into weapons, and extract them — all for a modest fee. Runes are powerful items that grant you special abilities powered by focus. They can either aid you in battle or assist in some other way.


How to equip Runes in No Rest for the Wicked


Runes won't be available in No Rest for the Wicked until you defeat Warrick the Torn and enter the city of Sacrament for the first time. You'll find the Rune master her…
articles.title: No Rest for the Wicked: All Runes, how to equip, and what they do

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
Warframe is a game all about materials. Whether it's getting enough to complete a blueprint, building enough of a stash to deal with future projects, or simply getting way more than you'll ever need on accident (looking at you, Salvage), it's the name of the game. However, some resources are more rare or difficult to get than others. Here's how to get Gyromag Systems in Warframe.


Where to farm Gyromag Systems in Warframe


Image via Destructoid.


Gyromag Systems are acquired by completing each phase of the Profit-Taker Orb bounty. To access the bounty, you must reach Rank 5: Old Mate with the Solaris United syndicate, found in Fortuna. Once you are Rank 5, head to the left of the main elevator and enter through closed doors to reach a small side room, where you'll find Eudico, The Busin…
articles.title: How to get Gyromag Systems in Warframe

articles.author: Shawn Robinson
articles.description:
If you've played Warframe for a while, then you know the game is chock full of numerous systems that are barely explained. The tutorial doesn't do a horrible job explaining the mechanics, but it avoids many deeper systems while going very surface-level with others. One such mechanic affects how you use your melee weapons if you have the right build. Here's what the Tennokai system is in Warframe.


How does the Tennokai system work in Warframe?


Tennokai is a melee-based system that affects how Heavy Attacks function, though only when a mod that enables Tennokai is equipped. With one on your melee weapon, any melee hits have a 15% chance to flash a sword icon on your reticle for two seconds, referred to as an Opportunity. Performing a Heavy Attack or Heavy Slam when this appears causes th…
articles.title: What is the Tennokai system in Warframe?

articles.author: Ryan Lemay
articles.description:
After suffering through what's arguably become a stale choice of viable weapons to use in short-range engagements, Warzone finally has a new SMG that's set to shake up the meta. 


In a desperate attempt to find any weapon better than the HRM-9 or MCW SMG conversion kit in Warzone, some players turned to the COR-45 since it had a faster time-to-kill than every SMG. However, a strange burst fire mechanic held the pistol back from holding a candle to other meta options. According to WZ Ranked, the MCW leads all weapons with a 24 percent pick rate and the HRM-9 ranks second at 19 percent. 


That could all change with the new BP50 Jak Revenger Kit. the conversion kit transforms the AR into an SMG that shreds up close-and-personal. According to data provided by TrueGameData, the BP50 has a bet…
articles.title: Best BP50 Jak Revenger kit loadout in Warzone

articles.author: Jamie Moorcroft-Sharp
articles.description:
Rare has created a pretty unique MMO in Sea of Thieves, throwing players into its waters and letting them sink or swim on their own merit. Now, the PS5 version is set to do the same, but thanks to the game's success on Xbox and PC, it feels like it already has armbands. 


Sea of Thieves adopted a community of 40 million players in April 2024 from the PC and Xbox fan base alone. While that number is incredibly impressive, there are even more fans who can't wait to get into the game on PS5 either through early access with the Premium Edition or the full release five days later. The only trouble I and many other PS5 fans are having is working out when the game will be available to play. 


What time does Sea of Thieves early access release on PS5?


Screenshot via PlayStation's YouTube chann…
articles.title: What time does Sea of Thieves release on PS5? (Early access and full release)

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
In Fruit Battlegrounds, Soru is a unique ability that is essentially an upgraded travel method. Instead of dashing around like normal, Soru enables you to teleport forward at a faster speed and further distance. You can also jump higher with Soru. It does have a brief cooldown, but you can still perform your regular dash while waiting for Soru. Here is how to get Soru in Fruit Battlegrounds which you will want to do ASAP.




Screenshot by Destructoid


How to get Soru in Fruit Battlegrounds


To get Soru in Fruit Battlegrounds, you need to complete a series of tasks for the Teacher hidden under the Giant Tree and then he will teach you it. Before you can unlock the quest with the Teacher, you need to perform a series of pre-requisite tasks beforehand. Here's everything you need to do to g…
articles.title: How to get Soru in Fruit Battlegrounds

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
The whole Amp system in Warframe can be a bit overwhelming and complicated. It’s a modular system where you can choose what parts to combine to make the perfect weapon for your Operator. The thing is, there’s going to be a meta, just like the rest of the game. Since components to craft these aren’t too easy to come by, here are five of the best Amps we came up with in Warframe. It'll help save you time on messing around with less effective parts.


The best amps in Warframe ranked


As you will see, the Amps will be listed by components. They are listed by Prism, Scaffold, and Brace. The Prism will be your Amp’s primary firing mechanism, with the Scaffold being the secondary. The Brace will determine a stat effect like critical, status, or recharge time.


Also, these loadouts are going to…
articles.title: The five best Amps in Warframe, ranked

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Anyone who's watched or read up on Spy x Family has undoubtedly fallen in love with the dynamic Forger household. Each arc offers a mixture of heartfelt moments, intense action sequences, and a new Anya expression to behold. However, all good things must come to an end, and we're here to explain if the Spy x Family manga is finished. 


Is Spy x Family manga completed?


Spy x Family is still ongoing, as new manga chapters are still rolling out. There seems to be no end in sight for the series, so you can look forward to more exciting new content for the Forger family. 


Image via Wit Studio/CloverWorks


Manga readers can anticipate two to three chapters per month. Platforms like Viz Media and Manga Plus stay up-to-date on the series, and the three newest chapters are free to read. Additionally, there are extra side stories to explore, adding more depth to the beloved characters Loid, Anya, Yor, and many others. 


The Spy x Family manga offers a rich tapestry of storylines, including the intriguing Friendship Schemes, the suspenseful Mole Hunt, and the high-stakes Term Finals arcs. Each chapter delves into the adventures of Operation Strix, an elite mission dedicated to maintaining peace in Westalis and Ostania. 


Where does the Spy x Family anime leave off in the manga?


The anime's Season 2 ending occurs sometime around Chapter 60 in the manga. The show still has quite a bit to catch up on, so we don't have to worry about the anime ending anytime soon. The Spy x Family Code: White movie also features even more Forger shenanigans as the family participates in Eden Academy's cooking competition. 

The post Is Spy x Family manga finished? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Is Spy x Family manga finished?

articles.author: Ryan Lemay
articles.description:
All signs point toward Raven Software not making any changes to Urzikstan in Season 3 Reloaded, and players are starting to get worried about the future of their favorite battle royal map. 


Season 3 Reloaded starts on May 1. Raven Software provided a sneak peek at what's in store for the upcoming update. Notably, there wasn't any mention of changes to Urzikstan or the traditional battle royale game mode mentioned in the blog post. After two straight seasonal updates focused on adding two new Resurgence maps, players assumed that Urzikstan would finally get some much-needed shine in Season 3 Reloaded. 


It appears that they were sorely mistaken, as CharlieIntel reports, "There are no updates or changes to Urzikstan in Warzone with Season 3 Reloaded. The blog just says the story within th…
articles.title: Warzone Season 3 Reloaded spells bad news for fans of Urzikstan

articles.author: Ryan Lemay
articles.description:
NBA superstar Devin Booker is set to receive an operator skin in Modern Warfare 3 and Warzone. Here is everything you need to know about adding the bundle to your collection. 


Activision confirmed Suns guard Devin Booker is getting an operator bundle in MW3 and Warzone. Booker joins his Phoenix teammate Kevin Durant, who received an operator bundle in 2023. In a recent appearance on the Aux Money Podcast, Durant revealed that Booker is "elite" at Warzone and averages 12 kills a game. 


How to get Devin Booker in MW3 and Warzone


Image via Activision


The Devin Booker operator bundle can only be obtained through the CoD store. Activision did not reveal a price point, but based on previous operator skins, it will most likely cost 2,400 CoD points, equivalent to $19.99.


When is Devin Booker coming to MW3 and Warzone ?


Activision announced that players can purchase the Devin Booker operator bundle starting May 1. Coincidentally, this aligns with the NBA Playoffs. Devin Booker and the Phoenix Suns are currently down two games in the first-round series against Minnesota. It's quite possible that the Suns season will be over by the time fans get a chance to purchase this operator bundle, which would be unfortunate timing. However, a comeback is never out of the cards when you have fellow NBA superstar Kevin Durant on your side. 


Everything included in the Devin Booker operator bundle.


Here is everything that comes with the Booker operator bundle. 



“DBook” operator skin


“Sunrise” MTZ-762 Battle Rifle weapon tracer blueprint 


“Sunset” WSP-9 SMG weapon tracer blueprint 


“Sick ‘Em Haven” finishing move


“Booker Card” large decal


“Lucky Ace” weapon sticker


“Man’s Best Friend” charm


“Be Legendary” loading screen.


The post How to get the Devin Booker operator bundle in MW3 and Warzone appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get the Devin Booker operator bundle in MW3 and Warzone

articles.author: Ryan Lemay
articles.description:
Raven Software planned on removing the High Trip Resurgence limited-time game mode from Warzone, but decided instead to give players a chance to keep it around for another week. Yet what many expected to be a slam-dunk vote has devolved into a more heated debate. 


The Warzone devs created a poll for players to decide whether or not they want the High Trip Resurgence LTM to return. As of writing, 50.7 percent of the 23,171 votes lean yes, while 49.3 percent said no. This is a surprise, after players initially pleaded for one of the game mode's features to be added permanently. High Trip Resurgence operates the same as a traditional Resurgence match for the most part, but players collect gummies that each have a power-up. Green Boost Grants players a temporary speed boost and negates fall damage, Fill Up awards faster reload speeds, High Focus highlights enemies with a red outline, and Loot Blast offers more loot from crates.


Image via Activision 


After getting a taste of unlimited-tac sprint from the green gummy, some players were ready for it to become a feature in every mode. However, other users weren't as fond of the mode and wanted it removed. CoD content creator TacticalBrit asked, "Are we genuinely going to keep an LTM that's just a reskin of the boy's LTM, and we've literally had no others?"


Meanwhile, Warzone content creator JGOD was shocked by how divided the poll was. "They don't seem to lean into LTMs, and the 1 time they do, half the people vote not to keep it," the YouTuber added. 


Warzone Meta asked,  "For the people who voted no, do you hate having fun?" If the devs don't plan on adding a playlist in its place, it's hard to tell why players would feel so negatively about High Trip Resurgence. But it's clear that players are frustrated and this poll paints a much more troubling picture about the overall community sentiment regarding the battle royale. 

The post Warzone players divided over adding back High Trip Resurgence LTM appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Warzone players divided over adding back High Trip Resurgence LTM

articles.author: Kyle Hilliard
articles.description:
This week on The Game Informer Show podcast, it's all about reviews. We had three big reviews drop this week (on the same day [around the same time]), as well as a TV show review. Join host Kyle Hilliard as Matt Miller discusses Stellar Blade, Wesley LeBlanc chats about Another Crab's Treasure, and Brian Shea tells us what he thinks of the Knuckles TV show. Kyle also talks about his time with Sand Land and Brian shares preview impressions of the first original Monkey Ball game in years as well as the new TopSpin tennis game.
Episode 704 – Stellar Blade, Sand Land, Monkey Ball, Crabs, And Knuckles:


Follow us on social media: Kyle Hilliard (@KyleMHilliard), Brian Shea (@BrianPShea), Wesley LeBlanc (@LeBlancWes)
The Game Informer Show is a weekly gaming podcast covering the latest video game news, industry topics, exclusive reveals, and reviews. Join host Alex Van Aken every Thursday to chat about your favorite games – past and present – with Game Informer staff, developers, and special guests from around the industry. Listen on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or your favorite podcast app.
Matt Storm, the freelance audio editor for The Game Informer Show, edited this episode. Matt is an experienced podcast host and producer who's been speaking into a microphone for over a decade. You should listen to Matt's shows like the "Fun" And Games Podcast and Reignite, a BioWare-focused podcast. 

The Game Informer Show – Podcast Timestamps:

00:00:00 - Intro
00:02:57 - Stellar Blade Review
00:25:13 - Sand Land Review
00:38:59 - Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble Preview
00:49:23 - Another Crab's Treasure Review

01:27:00 - Housekeeping
articles.title: Stellar Blade, Sand Land, Monkey Ball, Crabs, And Knuckles | GI Show

articles.author: Charles Harte
articles.description:
Dragon's Dogma 2 launched a little over a month ago and has already managed to sell 2.5 million copies, but Capcom is still releasing updates to patch minor issues with the game. While a large volume of complaints have been about the lack of a performance mode, this update (like the last update) does not address that issue. However, it does aim to clean up a number of irritating errors involving the behavior of pawns, the player's AI companions.
An update for Dragon's Dogma 2 is now live on all platforms!
https://t.co/waEdG0ntSv
April 25, 2024
For starters, this update makes it easier to detect dragonsplague, an affliction that, if untreated, can lead to devastating consequences for your pawns and your world. It's also contagious, so it's a good idea to nip it in the bud as soon as you first encounter it. When afflicted, pawns' eyes will glow red – after this update, they'll glow more noticeably. The update also causes the disease to infect pawns less frequently.
Pawns should also be a lot less annoying now, thanks to a whole slate of minor refinements to their behavior. They'll jump off cliffs less often (which is hilarious but a wild inconvenience), say some lines less often, say other lines at more appropriate times and become less likely to offer to be hired while passing by on the street. They're one of the highlights of the game, so anything done to make their constant presence more consistent is always welcome.
There are also smaller adjustments, like adding the ability to zoom in on a character's face in shops, preventing monster attacks in town from leading to the player's arrest, and other miscellaneous bug fixes. You can read the full list of updates, as well as all past updates, here.
articles.title: Today's Dragon's Dogma 2 Update Makes Dragonsplague More Visible, Pawns Less Annoying

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
Developer Trialforge Studio and publisher Tate Multimedia revealed Deathbound, a new Soulslike with a unique class-based twist, last August. At the time, PC was its only platform but now, Game Informer can exclusively reveal Deathbound will also come to PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S day-in-date with PC later this year. 
As we learned with Deathbound's reveal last year, the game wears its Soulslike inspiration on its sleeve. However, it aims to differentiate itself within the ever-growing genre with what Trialforge calls a single-player party-based system. Players will control a single vessel that channels various heroes known as the fallen. These are individual characters, each with unique skill sets, combat styles, and lore, that share the player-controlled vessel. As such, players ca…
articles.title: Deathbound, A Single-Player Party-Based Soulslike, Hits PlayStation, Xbox, And PC This Year

articles.author: Kyle Hilliard
articles.description:
Stellar Blade is out this week and our review, which you can read right here, is positive. We liked the game and were impressed by the depth of its action and world-building. Ahead of its release, but after spending some time with the game, we had a chance to reconnect with Shift Up CEO and Stellar Blade director Hyung-Tae Kim after speaking with him earlier this year. This time we spoke to him (through a translator) about inspirations for the game beyond Nier Automata (like the Bible and The Matrix), the approach to costumes and how they fit in the lore, and why having no minimaps in the game was a purposeful decision.


Game Informer: There are multiple endings?
Hyung-Tae Kim: There are multiple endings and actually, if you complete certain quests, there is a post-credits clip, as well.
…
articles.title: Stellar Blade Is Based On The Bible, But Don’t Take It Too Seriously

It’s hard to predict when new games might arrive as the company has maintained a somewhat inconsistent cadence in doing so, but that’s okay because this list is all you need. 
As Nintendo adds new titles, we’ll be sure to update this list to include them. If you’re looking for something specific, use this story’s Table of Contents to jump to the different consoles quickly. Here’s every NES, SNES, Game Boy, N64, Ge…

articles.author: Charles Harte
articles.description:
Taming a wolf in Minecraft is one of the game's simplest joys, and no matter how many times I start a new world, I always hoard bones in case I encounter one. But once you've adopted a canine companion, you probably hide them away in a house for safe-keeping, shielding them from the horrors of the game's hostile mobs. Today, Minecraft is adding a way to make them a little stronger – wolf armor.


Like leather armor, wolf armor can be colored using dyes in-game, so if you've got multiple adopted animals, it'll still be easy to tell them apart. This variation is separate from the collar colors as well, creating plenty of possibilities. Even better, the game is also adding wolf fur variants for the first time, bringing eight new patterns for a total of nine. Each variant (Pale, Woods, Ashen, Black, chestnut, Rusty, Spotted, Striped, and Snowy) spawns in a specific biome. You can take a look at all the new breeds in the gallery below.

Of course, players will need to be able to craft this wolf armor as well, which is where the new mob, the armadillo, comes in. These armored relatives of anteaters can be found in savannah or badland biomes, where they can be seen strolling around and curling into a defensive ball when certain enemies come near. Armadillos drop armadillo scutes, which are used to make the wolf armor, but the developers have reassured players that they can be brushed rather than defeated, so you won't have to go on an armadillo massacre to protect your pets. Armadillos can also be used to scare away spiders since they eat insects and arachnids in real life, and spider eyes can be used to breed them if you want to make your own armadillo farm.
You can read the rest of the notes for the 1.20.5 update right here.
articles.title: The Latest Minecraft Update Adds Wolf Armor, Wolf Breeds, And Armadillos

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
Epic Games has revealed a new setting for Fortnite that allows players to hide emotes the company considers "confrontational." This doesn't outright ban these emotes from the game and those with them can still use them, but if someone has this new setting turned off, they won't see others use them. 
Called "See Confrontational Emotes," players can choose whether they want to see emotes like "Laugh It Up," "Take the L," "Whipcrack," and "Make It Plantain" from anyone, from friends in a party, or never. Epic says players who have these emotes hidden with this new setting will see a player using the emote standing still, with no emote sound. 
This new setting can be found under "Social Privacy" in the Fortnite settings and it defaults to only show these confrontational emotes from friends in your party. Epic stresses that this setting does not change a player's ability to use any emotes. It is now live in-game. 
For more about Fortnite, check out these Avatar: The Last Airbender skins now available in the game, and then read about how Fortnite's next Star Wars crossover will span Lego, Fortnite Festival, and Battle Royale. After that, read about how Billie Eilish is headlining Fortnite Festival Season 3. 
How do you feel about this new emote setting? Let us know in the comments below!
articles.title: Fortnite Adds New Setting To Hide 'Confrontational Emotes'

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
Publisher Atlus and developer Studio Zero have released a new trailer for the upcoming fantasy RPG, Metaphor: ReFantazio, and it features plenty of new gameplay. It also reveals Metaphor: ReFantazio will hit PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC on October 11. 
Dubbed "The King's Trial," this new trailer sets up a bit of the Metaphor: ReFantazio's world more, highlighting a tournament for the king's throne at the center of the narrative. It seems our protagonist and the friends and allies they encounter along the way are vying for a crown that others are also after. In order to claim it, players must complete trials across the lands, proving their worth. 
Check it out for yourself in the Metaphor: ReFantazio gameplay trailer below: 


As you can see, Metaphor: ReFantazio continues to look excellent, with its Persona inspirations on full display. That's not surprising, though, considering Studio Zero is composed of various leads from Atlus' popular Persona series, including the latest in the franchise, Persona 5. 
If you've played Persona 5 Royal, or even the recently released Persona 3 Reload, then you know we're likely in for a treat when it comes to a few things: combat, narrative, and art. And if this new look at the game's menu are any indication, the Persona team has been cooking something special for Metaphor: ReFantazio. 
The trailer also reveals Metaphor: ReFantazio will get a special Collector's Edition for $149.99. The game's standard release will cost $69.99.
Here's what the Collector's Edition looks like: 
Metaphor: ReFantazio hits PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC on October 11, 2024. 
For more about the game, watch the Metaphor: ReFantazio reveal trailer. Read Game Informer's Persona 5 Royal review, and then read Game Informer's Persona 5 Tactica review after that. 
Are you picking up Metaphor: ReFantazio on day one? Let us know in the comments below!
articles.title: Metaphor: ReFantazio Gets October Release Date In New Gameplay Trailer

articles.author: Charles Harte
articles.description:
With the introduction of Fortnite Festival, Epic's rhythm game within the chart-topping Battle Royale, there's more incentive than ever for musicians to have their likenesses added to the game. The latest of these artists is Billie Eilish, who announced her collaboration with the game on social media earlier today.
Fortnite Festival Main Stage: 4.23.24 pic.twitter.com/dxaQBsqD4A
April 22, 2024
Eilish is not just getting a skin added to the game (like Eminem, for example), she's the next headliner for Fortnite Festival's main stage event, which will start tomorrow, April 23. This includes a set of artist-specific rotating songs players can compete for high scores in, as well as unlockable skins, songs, instruments, and other cosmetics, though unlocking all of these requires the purchase of the pricey 1,800 V-Buck Festival Pass. Previous headliners were The Weeknd and Lady Gaga.
Eilish recently made headlines for winning a Grammy, Golden Globe, and Oscar for "What Was I Made For" from the Barbie movie, which is a task she's now accomplished twice. Even more recently, she announced her upcoming album Hit Me Hard And Soft, which is likely her main marketing incentive for appearing in the game. For more Fortnite, check out the current Avatar: The Last Airbender crossover and read about the upcoming Star Wars event.
Will you be buying Eilish's festival pass? Which artist do you want to see in Fortnite next? Let us know in the comments!
articles.title: Billie Eilish Is Headlining Fortnite Festival Season 3

Developer Wētā Workshop and publisher Private Division have released the first trailer for Tales of the Shire, and it showcases what looks like a Middle-earth Animal Crossing game with hobbits and a cozy place to call home. This trailer arrives after the companies teased releasing the first Tales of the Shire trailer this month, following the game's reveal last year. 
In Tales of the Shire, players will create their own Hobbit before setting forth into Bywater, the shire setting of the game. Here, players can forage fruits and herbs, tend to gardens, fish, trade with townsfolk, and more, all while working to help Bywater, which has not yet been established as an official village in Hobbiton, flourish. 
"Greet comfort at the door as you deocrate your own Hobbit hole, tend to your garden, fi…

articles.author: Charles Harte
articles.description:
Summer Game Fest is just a few months away, but that's not stopping Xbox from hosting its own indie event next week. Partnering with IGN, the ID@Xbox Digital Showcase will air live next Monday, April 29, at 10 AM PT/ 1 PM ET. The event will feature "epic trailers, fresh gameplay, and new reveals," according to the announcement blog.
This announcement is brought to you by great indie games 📣

Tune in to the ID@Xbox x IGN Showcase on April 29 at 10am PT: https://t.co/ODYWGtHqzB pic.twitter.com/KdkACE03Ri
April 22, 2024
They've also given a heads-up on some games we can expect to see. Vampire Survivors, which cracked our top ten games of the year back in 2022, has been on the platform for some time now, but recently announced a new expansion featuring weapons and characters from the Contra series. Dungeons of Hinterberg is an action-adventure title announced at SGF last year that we got a chance to preview. The showcase will also spotlight co-op roguelike 33 Immortals and Don't Nod's upcoming adventure title, Lost Records: Bloom & Rage.
For more context, last year's version of this event included over 20 games, including Sea of Stars, Karateka, and Vampire Survivors again, somehow. Regardless of whether or not it appears, you can bet the comment section will be flooded with Hollow Knight: Silksong fans clamoring for the game, which we haven't seen since the Xbox summer showcase in 2022 when it was announced the game would come to Game Pass on day one.
You can watch the showcase next week on IGN's YouTube channel. The showcase will also be available in American Sign Language.
What are you hoping to see from the showcase? Let us know in the comments!
articles.title: ID@Xbox Digital Showcase Announced For Next Week

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
Embracer Group, the company that recently sold Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic remake developer Saber Interactive for $500 million, has announced its plans to split into three individual, publicly traded companies. As such, Embracer Group as we know it will be no more; instead, it will largely consist of Asmodee, Coffee Stain & Friends, and Middle-earth Enterprises & Friends. 
Each of these companies will be run individually and traded publicly in the market, with IP and franchises under the Embracer Group umbrella spread across them. This separation follows a rocky period for Embracer Group, which is behind layoffs at companies like Black Forest Games and Eidos-Montréal after a planned $2 billion deal with Saudi Arabia-backed Savvy Games Group fell through in 2023. 


"During the p…
articles.title: Embracer Group To Split Into Three Companies, Including One Called 'Middle-earth Enterprises & Friends'

articles.author: Brian Shea
articles.description:
The live-action Sonic the Hedgehog movie series that started in 2020 has delivered entertaining adventures starring everybody's favorite Blue Blur and his ever-growing stable of friends. One of the highlights of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 was Knuckles, voiced by Idris Elba. The fish-out-of-water gags and his strict adherence to the echidna warrior code, which is in stark contrast to Sonic's fun-loving personality, made for an enjoyable dynamic within the cast of characters. Knuckles, the new six-episode streaming show on Paramount Plus, tries to carry forward that dynamic. However, thanks to low stakes, a palpable disconnect from the larger Sonic story, and too much emphasis on the human characters in the world, it falls short of the heights reached by the two theatrical films.
Warning: While I …
articles.title: Knuckles Show Review – A Low-Stakes Climb

articles.author: Marcus Stewart
articles.description:
After The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time reinvented the series in 3D and became its new gold standard, Nintendo followed up with a surreal sequel in Majora's Mask. Set two months after the events of Ocarina, Link finds himself transported to an alternate version of Hyrule called Termina and must prevent a very angry moon from crashing into the Earth over the course of three constantly repeating days. Majora's Mask's unique structure and bizarre tone have earned it legions of passionate defenders and detractors, and one long-time Zelda fan is going to experience it for the first time to see where he lands on that spectrum.
Join Marcus Stewart and Kyle Hilliard today and each Friday on Twitch at 2 p.m. CT as they gradually work their way through the entire game until Termina is saved. Archived episodes will be uploaded each Saturday on our second YouTube channel Game Informer Shows, which you can watch both above and by clicking the links below. 
Part 1 - Plenty of Time
Part 2 - The Bear
Part 3 - Deku Ball Z
Part 4 - Pig Out
Part 5 - The Was a Bad Choice!
Part 6 - Ray Darmani
Part 7 - Curl and Pound
Part 8 - Almost a Flamethrower
Part 9 - Take Me Higher
Part 10 - Time Juice
Part 11 - The One About Joey
Part 12 - Ugly Country
Watch on Twitch!
If you enjoy our livestreams but haven’t subscribed to our Twitch channel, know that doing so not only gives you notifications and access to special emotes. You’ll also be granted entry to the official Game Informer Discord channel, where our welcoming community members, moderators, and staff gather to talk games, entertainment, food, and organize hangouts! Be sure to also follow our second YouTube channel, Game Informer Shows, to watch other Replay episodes as well as Twitch archives of GI Live and more.
articles.title: The Legend Of Zelda: Majora's Mask Part 12 | Super Replay

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
The Fabletown gang will be back, developer Telltale Games has promised in a new development update for The Wolf Among Us 2, its sequel to The Wolf Among Us it announced in 2019. This update, which reveals the studio is still hard at work on the game, arrives after an unspecified number of layoffs hit Telltale Games last October. 
"We've been quiet because we've been heads down, focusing on the promise of [The Wolf Among Us 2]," the update reads. "While we can't give a big update yet, here's a little something for you: in-progress shots from the current build. The work continues. The Fabletown gang will be back. Thanks for being fans." 
The four in-progress shots from the current build of The Wolf Among Us 2 can be viewed below: 

The Wolf Among Us 2 was originally due out last year but was delayed out of 2023 in a March update from the studio. 
For more about the game, watch The Wolf Among Us 2's official trailer, and then read about how the game's first episode will catch you up on what happened in the first game. 
Are you still excited for The Wolf Among Us 2? Let us know in the comments below!
articles.title: Telltale Games Releases New Screenshots Of The Wolf Among Us 2 Alongside Development Update

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
PlayStation and K-Pop singer NakedBibi, or Bibi for short, have teamed up to create a new song and music video inspired by Stellar Blade, the upcoming action game from developer ShiftUp. Stellar Blade hits PlayStation 5 exclusively next week on April 26 so this new track, appropriately titled "Eve," is coming at a perfect time to keep excitement for the game going. 
The song itself is pretty great, too, and the music video visuals are very reminiscent of Stellar Blade itself. If you're excited about the game, or a fan of NakedBibi, it's definitely worth your time. 
Check out the "Eve" Stellar Blade music video by NakedBibi for yourself below: 


If you haven't yet checked it out, there's a free Stellar Blade demo available right now on PS5 to give you a taste of what's in the final release. For more about the game, read Game Informer's exclusive interview with Stellar Blade's director for behind-the-scene details and more. After that, read about how Stellar Blade will have no microtransactions, with one exception. 
Stellar Blade hits PS5 on April 26, 2024. 
What do you think of this song? Let us know in the comments below!
articles.title: PlayStation And K-Pop Singer NakedBibi Team Up For Stellar Blade Music Video

articles.author: Wesley LeBlanc
articles.description:
Amazon Prime Video has renewed its Fallout television show for another season, confirming that Season 2 is in the works following an earlier report. This news arrives just over a week after the series' release on April 10, which premiered two days earlier than expected to rave reviews from both fans and critics. 
We loved Fallout Season 1, and you can read about why in Game Informer's Fallout review, so we're excited to revisit the wasteland with Lucy, Ghoul, Maximus, and others. As for when to expect Season 2 of Fallout, that remains unknown. The announcement simply confirms another season is coming with no details on Season 2's production. 
Wouldn't want to keep you on the edge of your seat, now, would we?
pic.twitter.com/ULs6DEPHDW
April 18, 2024
Fallout joins a string of other hit Amazon Prime Video series currently airing on the streamer service, like The Boys (with a new season dropping June 13) and Invincible, which just had its second season wrap up. It also joins a string of other successful video game adaptations, like HBO's The Last of Us, which is getting a Season 2 next year, Peacock's Twisted Metal, Netflix's Arcane, and Netflix's Cyberpunk: Edgerunners. 
Fallout Season 1 is available to watch on Amazon Prime Video. 
Did you enjoy Season 1 of Fallout? Let us know in the comments below!
articles.title: Amazon's Fallout TV Series Renewed For Season 2

articles.author: Alex Van Aken
articles.description:
In this week's episode of The Game Informer Show, the crew looks ahead at the current slate of publisher showcases happening around Summer Game Fest and subsequent announcements we'd like to see. We chat about Amazon's Fallout show, rewatching the original X-Men animated series, and A24's Civil War before remembering this is a video game podcast. Afterward, Alex shares his very early impressions of World of Warcraft: The War Within's first alpha test, and Charles discusses his time playing Dragon's Dogma 2. 
Episode 703 - The Countdown To Summer Game Fest Begins:


Follow us on social media: Alex Van Aken (@itsVanAken), Marcus Stewart (@MarcusStewart7), Charles Harte (@ChuckDuck365)
The Game Informer Show is a weekly gaming podcast covering the latest video game news, industry topics, exclusive reveals, and reviews. Join host Alex Van Aken every Thursday to chat about your favorite games – past and present – with Game Informer staff, developers, and special guests from around the industry. Listen on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or your favorite podcast app.
Matt Storm, the freelance audio editor for The Game Informer Show, edited this episode. Matt is an experienced podcast host and producer who's been speaking into a microphone for over a decade. You should listen to Matt's shows like the "Fun" And Games Podcast and Reignite, a BioWare-focused podcast.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance faced a rocky launch in 2018, with outlets (including Game Informer) criticizing its widespread bugs and general lack of polish, but it found success regardless, going on to sell two million copies and release a slate of DLC and updates. Six years later, Warhorse Studios is getting ready to launch a sequel and invited Game Informer to take a look at some early footage and trailers.
